column7: This course is identical to PS 280 except for the additional writing component that fulfills the campus' advanced composition requirement. Credit is not given for both PS 280 and PS 281. Prerequisite: Completion of campus Composition I general education requirement.
column9: Credit is not given for both PS 280 and PS 281. Prerequisite: Completion of campus Composition I general education requirement.
column10: Advanced Composition, and Social & Beh Sci - Soc Sci course.
